General.Name: Oppein Home Group Inc
General.Description: Oppein Home Group Inc. operates as a cabinetry manufacturer in Asia. The company offers kitchen and bathroom cabinets, wardrobes, interior doors, kitchen electrical appliances and accessories, and home furniture, as well as other building materials. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Optima Enterprise Co., Ltd and changed its name to Oppein Home Group Inc. in 2010. Oppein Home Group Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
